question: What is the meaning of the two names, Muhammad, and Ahmed, of Prophet S.A.W.S.Since Imam Mehdi will have the same name, what will be exactly his name?
answer:
QUESTION
Since the Prophet S.A.W.S. did not have Mehdi as his name, how can Imam Mehdi have the same name as the Prophet S.A.W.S.?
ANSWER


Share:
Muhammad and Ahmad - the praised one

Mahdi literally means the guided. That will be his title as he will be guided by Allah Ta'ala.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
